page.title: 09TOURISM IN BEADNELL.
page.content: We have 450 static caravans with an extra 100 Caravan Club members during summer. There is a large Camping Site run by the Camping Club of Great Britain. We have a Sailing Club,water ski-ing in the bay. Wind surfing is the fashionable sport at the moment. 2 shops,1 is a Post Office with cafe &fish & chips take-away. 1 Hotel,2 Pubs,one pub. & 2 houses offer Bed & Breakfast accommodation. 73% of the houses are holiday or 2nd homes,empty from Sept - Easter. A local garage has bus tours & in summer months goes to Berwick on Wed, Edinburgh on Thursday & Holy Island.
